programme.title: Bros on Foot Ep4
programme.desc: The 4 actors will go on a road trip on behalf of the youth who have spent the past few years at home. The crew will visit New Zealand and complete missions to win vacation tickets and gifts for youth.

programme.title: Flower of Evil Ep15
programme.desc: A psychopath falsifies everything about his cruel past to marry his wife. However, his secrets are soon revealed after his wife, a detective, doubts him as a suspect of a murder case.

programme.title: The Genius Paik 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Top Korean restaurateur chef Paik is back with a team of A-list celebrities, accepting the challenge of starting a Korean restaurant and introducing Korean cuisine to the globe in an unfamiliar country.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep26
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep309310
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47824783

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1878
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3738
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2137
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep188
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the others parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous Twin Swords in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlords daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tihs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wongs disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Diary Of A Lady-Killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Melody Of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and youve got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain, and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and youve got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: The Emperor And His Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor'S Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun, the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: "Hereafter" tells the story of three people who are touched by death in different ways. George (Matt Damon) is a blue-collar American with a special connection to the afterlife dating from his childhood. On the other side of the world, Marie (Ccile De France), a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when London schoolboy Marcus (Frankie and George McLaren) loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each seeking the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter. Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this haunting original tale from a screenplay by two-time Oscar nominee Peter Morgan.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Danube - From crystal-clear waterfalls to baby turtles the size of a thumbnail - explore the magical wonders of the Danube. Branching out across Europe, its tributaries gather water from 19 countries.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Smoker - Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.desc: Havana - Joanna Lumley travels across two of the most enigmatic countries in the Caribbean - Cuba and Haiti. Joanna kicks off her adventure in the back of a classic car in Havana, outlining her 1500-mile Caribbean adventure.

programme.desc: Holyhead Island - On Holyhead Island in N/W Wales Kate discovers one of her favourite rare birds and Britain's longest break-water, a 1.7-mile-long feat of Victorian engineering.

programme.desc: Jungles: In The Thick Of It - Jungles are home to 80% of all species but they cover just 2% of the planet. When animals in these crowded forests want to mate, the challenge is how to stand out from the crowd.

programme.desc: Sicily - Stanley Tucci visits Italy's southernmost region, Sicily. He eats timballo with a princess, explores delicious ways to prepare sardines and is invited to a dinner blending foods from across the world.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Coffee - Gregg Wallace is in Derbyshire at an enormous coffee factory where they produce 175,000 jars of instant coffee every day.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deep Thinkers - Spy Sperm Whale has close encounters with the largest brains on the planet, while Spy Octopus takes us inside the mind of the world's smartest octopus.

programme.title: The Last Overland S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Homeward Bound? - The team travel through Azerbaijan, Georgia and Turkey, where they re-join the First Overland route at last. Now it's a road-race through Europe to be home in time for Christmas.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Trainer - Hannah Fry visits E-bay's Authentication Centre where they're waging war against fake high value trainers. She discovers how American breakfast waffles transformed our trainer soles, that a family feud created two of the world's biggest trainer brands and how an 18th century tea set led to the use of celebrity endorsement.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep14
programme.desc: The Burden of Possessions - With temperatures on the rise, Alaskans must ensure their survival in the hostile Arctic.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Killer Packs Ep4
programme.desc: Surviving in the African savanna requires wit and guile, especially for two of its hunters: African wild dogs and dwarf mongooses. These two enigmatic species live in packs and rely on well-coordinated teamwork to succeed. From looking after youngsters to finding food and warding off enemies, both species rely on their tight-knit families to overcome the challenges of everyday life.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - Bound By Blood Ep3
programme.desc: Dry season in Zambia means new life for the Nsefu pride of lions along the Luangwa River. From their first day on earth to the playful days of youth, see how new cubs rely on the strong bond of the entire pride for their survival.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - When the Rain Comes Ep1
programme.desc: The Arabian landscape is a virtually waterless desert where rain scarcely falls and animals endure blistering temperatures. But for 3 months every year, a remote region on the south west coast undergoes an astonishing transformation into a lush, verdant oasis.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - In Cold Blood Ep2
programme.desc: It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia theres a different story this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Sea of Cortez Ep1
programme.desc: Cabo Pulmo, a tiny ocean community on the shores of Mexicos Sea of Cortez, is home to an extraordinary story of marine recovery. By the mid-1980s, this near-pristine coral reef was all but wiped out decimated by reckless overfishing. That is, until those same fishermen abandoned their way of life and fought to save what Jacques Cousteau once called the aquarium of the world'.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - The Garden Route Ep1
programme.desc: In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. Fire and wind fuel growth in great diversity and rock shapes a coastline of many faces. Life thrives here - from the magnificent to the bizarre. This is the Garden Route National Park.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Elephant Story Ep3
programme.desc: Once abundant on the continent, elephant populations have been drastically reduced by hunting for ivory and meat in the last 200 years. Yet there are pockets of hope for these gentle giants, found in dedicated elephant conservation reserves like Addo Elephant Park and Tembe Elephant Park in South Africa. Protected from poachers within the parks, elephant numbers are growing.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Killer Packs Ep4
programme.desc: Surviving in the African savanna requires wit and guile, especially for two of its hunters: African wild dogs and dwarf mongooses. These two enigmatic species live in packs and rely on well-coordinated teamwork to succeed. programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality Ep2
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Elephant Story Ep3
programme.desc: Once abundant on the continent, elephant populations have been drastically reduced by hunting for ivory and meat in the last 200 years. programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - In Cold Blood Ep2
programme.desc: It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia theres a different story this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 9 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep3
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Palau Shark Sanctuary Ep2
programme.desc: Palau is a tiny country with a big story. In 2009, this island nation in the middle of the western Pacific Ocean created the worlds first shark sanctuary to protect more than 100 shark species from reckless overfishing and the brutal practice of commercial shark finning. Then, in 2014, Palau once again led the way. It established the worlds largest marine sanctuary a no-go zone for foreign commercial fisheries nearly the size of California.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Kruger's Pafuri Ep2
programme.desc: In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. Its a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - The Misfits Ep4
programme.desc: In an extraordinary story of love and betrayal, a young lion cub is cast out from the pride for being the runt of the litter. To survive, he must conquer overwhelming hardships. In this part of Zambia, that is no easy feat.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - When the Rain Comes Ep1

programme.desc: In an extraordinary story of love and betrayal, a young lion cub is cast out from the pride for being the runt of the litter. To survive, he must conquer overwhelming hardships. In this part of Zambia, that is no easy feat.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Heidelberg Ep1
programme.desc: Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Carcassonne Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

Then, in 2014, Palau once again led the way. It established the worlds largest marine sanctuary a no-go zone for foreign commercial fisheries nearly the size of California.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Kruger's Pafuri Ep2
programme.desc: In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. Its a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - When the Rain Comes Ep1
programme.desc: The Arabian landscape is a virtually waterless desert where rain scarcely falls and animals endure blistering temperatures. But for 3 months every year, a remote region on the south west coast undergoes an astonishing transformation into a lush, verdant oasis.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - In Cold Blood Ep2
programme.desc: It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia theres a different story this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - The Misfits Ep4
programme.desc: In an extraordinary story of love and betrayal, a young lion cub is cast out from the pride for being the runt of the litter. To survive, he must conquer overwhelming hardships. In this part of Zambia, that is no easy feat.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Heidelberg Ep1
programme.desc: Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Carcassonne Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Kruger's Pafuri Ep2

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep3
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 10 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the centers aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote thats too people-friendly.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Joined at the Hip Ep4
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Giants of Palau Ep3
programme.desc: Palau, a tiny island nation in the middle of the western Pacific ocean, is a land of giants. Large manta rays soar through its azure seas. Massive Second World War wrecks harbor dark secrets on the ocean floor. The archipelago is surrounded by a colossal underwater trench that reaches more than half a mile down into unseen depths. Its reef, one the largest living structures on the planet, is home to more than 1,500 species of fish.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Augrabies Falls Ep3
programme.desc: Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word oukurubes which means place of thunder in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - Teenage Pride Ep5
programme.desc: Adolescence isnt easy for lions. Learning how to hunt and establishing ones place amongst the pride are just two of the challenges young felines have to face. And when an encounter with water buffalo turns deadly, the entire pride is affected.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep14
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Accidents - Something strange is happening in Toyland trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Hear It For Big Chris - Big Chris is working on Loada while the others plan a surprise evening for him for being the longest serving member of Silver hatch

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King's Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep9

programme.desc: Sandstorm - The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks, which leaves Ty Rux and the Reptools to find a way to save them.

programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep8
programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica... IN COLOR! - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep15
programme.desc: The Case Of The Blue Wall - Everyone is going to play Hide and Seek in Brickabuild but Fuse stops the game because someone has painted the big wall outside his workshop blue! What if they do it again? Or if they decide to paint the rest of Brickabuild? Noddy uses all his investigating skills of who, what, where, when, why and how to work out that the wall must have been painted by someone very tall who likes the colour blue. Smartysaurus! She admits she painted it so that she could be better at hide-and-seek! Noddy helps her to understand that she can play the game without having to cheat. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep15
programme.desc: Why Porcupine Has Quills - You see there was a time when Porcupine didn't have quills, she had the softest coat in all of Tinga Tinga and Jackal wanted it. Despite warnings from all the animals Porcupine allows Jackal to invite her to his cave to keep out of the rain. Porcupine takes off her coat to allow it to dry, but while she sleeps naughty Jackal runs off with it. When she awakes Porcupine is covered in lots of tiny ant bites and they itch and they itch and they itch. Tortoise suggests Elephant squeeze some milk from the Milky Quill bush but Porcupine can't wait anymore and runs into the Quill bushes to relieve her itching. Crash! Crash! Crash! Porcupine crashes through the Quill bushes and emerges covered in spikey quills! The animals can't believe their eyes! But Porcupine is delighted as no beast will ever come near her sensitive skin ever again! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep15
programme.desc: Funny Business - Big Chris receives a mysterious parcel the cars are intrigued to find out what is in it. Strange and silly things start happening at the workshop, could it have anything to do with Big Chris' package?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fable Forest Gold - The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep16
programme.desc: Why Lizard Always Hides Under Rocks - You see there was a time when Lizard didn't hide under rocks. He would scamper around Tinga Tinga pinching other animals food and keeping it all for himself. Then one day the animals decide to give greedy Lizard a dose of his own medicine. When Lizard realizes the error of his ways he runs and hides under a rock too ashamed to show his face in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep16
programme.desc: Nick Solves The Case - PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep10
programme.desc: Fake Ravine - When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep21
programme.desc: Grug V Gurg / Unfair Fair - Grug wants a day off from his honey-do-list so he subs in doppelganger Gurg/Eep and Thunk set out to sabotage Bulk and Sulk's "idea fair" project because they always win even though Snoot comes up with the ideas.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep36
programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Rock / Pups Save a Good Mayor - Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer - After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep419
programme.desc: Happy Birthday, Sage & Ginger - It's Sage & Ginger's first birthday party! The whole Spice Family is ready to celebrate, but there's no cake! Josh plays Blue's Clues to figure out who will make the cake, and even visits Birthday Party World along the way.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Pups Save the Polar Bears - Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Runaway Hamster Ball / The Perfectinator - Steel accidentally uses the growth ray on Stu and Safia's pet hamster, turning her into a giant stomping hamster! // Steel and Lady Fluffpot get involved in a tidying robot one-up-manship battle when Kai makes Botler the tidiest robot in the city.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as. // Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep311
programme.desc: A Pup in Sheep's Clothing - When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Als pasture, its up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepwalking Bear / Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny - The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up. // Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep124
programme.desc: The Clean Team / The Thinkybubble Boxen / Bubble Bubble Bossy and Trouble - Bossy and Turtle teach Honey Bear about teamwork. // Chipper is moving. // Bossy protects his bubble friend from popping.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep209

programme.desc: The Train Badge - Duggee is playing with his train set. Choo-choo! Hennie arrives and she has a train too. The squirrels ask if they can play with it. You can't play with it; you can play IN it says Hennie!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Everglades National Park, Florida - The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitch's picnic.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Tent-O-Saurus - Sandy discovers ten dinosaur bones and rebuilds a fearsome creature.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep92
programme.desc: Feeling Better - It's time to wake up but Tinky Winky isn't feeling well. Soon, Tinky Winky feels better but now Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po don't feel well.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Milk - Dee encourages a friend to say 'milk' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of milk - pink milk, banana milk and bedtime milk. Dee even gets a milk moustache!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Big Sister Day - Hooper plans a special surprise party for Phoebe. But can Hooper finish the preparations and give his big sister a party to remember?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Tiny Sandwiches - Messy joins Zim and his friends on a mission inside a sandwich to photograph some atoms for Mayor Oki... Everyone say cheese!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tiny Little Me - When Monty and Jimmy Jones discover that Jeanie is having trouble writing lyrics for her song, they suggest they all spend some time in the backyard looking for inspiration, and imagine what the garden would look like if they were shrunk down to the size of a bee.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Early Baby - Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep37
programme.desc: The Dos and Don'ts Badge - The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep36
programme.desc: The Exercise Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep35
programme.desc: The Music Video Badge - The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Kinderdijk, Netherlands - The Go Jetters travel to Kinderdijk in The Netherlands to celebrate National Mill Day.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Andy and the Sarcastic Fringehead - Andy heads to the Pacific coast of California in search of a sarcastic fringehead.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Animal Machines - In this episode Grace looks at three amazing animal machines: a horsebox, an animal operating theatre and a polar research vessel.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep18
programme.desc: Proper Pirate Proficiency Test - Captain Captain is wearing her Proper Pirate Proficiency badge and Seaweed realises he doesn't have one! He discovers he will have to pass the Proper Pirate Proficiency Test or he'll have to leave.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The River Badge - Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat! Good job Duggee has his River badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - The squirrels make new friends, play games and have a picnic at a Jamboree. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping, so they build a tent. Then the squirrels hear a scary noise outside the tent. What can it be? All sorts of things are imagined. DUGGEE!!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Mudslide - It's a very rainy day at the Go Jet Academy and the Go Jetters are teaching the Cadets some crucial Go Jetter skills.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep8
programme.desc: Diesel's Special Delivery - Diesel swaps his dull load of slate for a haul of shiny red apples in order to please Sodor's school children.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Perimeter Pals - Sarah, Duck & Bug set off on a big adventure, through uncharted territory, as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Rainbow Race - The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah & Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Lunar Eclipzzz - Nelly has to help Nora stay awake long enough to see the Lunar eclipse.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dog Loves Mysteries - On a foggy day in London Dog and Pug meet up with Sherlock Holmes and Watson. They all become separated in the heavy fog. Pug's ingenious plan helps them all to find each other and solve their mysteries.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dino Saurus Games - Whilst playing animal races in the backyard, Jeanie tells Monty that all dinosaurs were slow, leading Monty and Jimmy Jones to imagine traveling back millions of years to see if they can find a fast dinosaur.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep7
programme.desc: It's time to visit the farm - JoJo is excited to show Gran Gran around the city farm - it's been a few months since she was last there, and she can't wait to see Melanie the chick again. But where could she be?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Egg Hill Farm - The folk at Egg Hill Farm are overrun... how can they house the chickens without leaving their home?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Meow Mountain - Tinpotown's "eye in the sky" helicopter Pilot Po doesn't want to take his eyes of his new pet kitten.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Muffin Cone - When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice. The squirrels want to make him feel better. Duggee tries to tell them that he needs some water but the squirrels don't quite understand.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Pizza Badge - Duggee wants to try out his new pizza oven, so while he makes the bases the Squirrels each put on all the toppings they like best. Some of their combinations are... interesting!
