programme.desc: SpongeBob in Randomland / SpongeBob's Bad Habit - SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Mysterions - When Theodore discovers Alvin and Simon have a secret club, he promises not to tell anyone if they let him join.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Artsy Smartsy / The Crush - Theodore helps Simon to try and get past his perfectionism in order to complete an art assignment for art class. // Simon has a crush on the babysitter and secretly prepares a romantic dinner while Theodore keeps Alvin distracted.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Best in Shoe / Royal Pain - To land the lead role in a play, Alvin wagers Brittany that he can remain in character as a shoe cobbler. // When Brittany becomes convinced she's a long lost princess she carries her new royal status a little too far.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep277
programme.desc: Captain Pipsqueak/Plane to Sea - Plankton joins the League of E.V.I.L. // SpongeBob and Patrick take Squidward on a plane to a tropical resort.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep278
programme.desc: Squidferatu / Slappy Days - Squidward ventures to Nosferatu's castle after accidentally receiving his mail. // Nosferatu's minion Slappy kills some time around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep235
programme.desc: Library Cards - When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep116
programme.desc: First Aid Last Aid / Night of the Living Stench - Camp Master Krabs finally hires a camp nurse, but she needs to dedicate all her time and effort to keeping SpongeBob safe. // When all the campers try to win the 'Stinkiest Camp in the Forest' award, Squidward has to fend for his life to stay clean.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Last Laugh / Driver's Dread - Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge when she replaces him with Lola in her act. // Hoping to drive out to the outlets to meet Lori, Leni ooks for alternative ways to get her driver's license.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Bummer Camp / Sleepstakes - When Gramps struggles to run Camp Mastadon, the kids come to his rescue. //The Loud kids help Lana get over her fear of sleepovers.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Traditions - Robby backs out of Alex's traditional Wakwak hunt, so Alex shares his family history with Bumblebee, while Twitch, eager to gain her own traditions, encounters "Dad2" - Wheeljack.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Dad's Stache Stash / A Root Galoot - Cecil shows Patrick his mustache collection. // The Star family brings a mandrake root into their home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Squawk in the Name of Love - Sergio enlists Adelaide's help to become a gentleman in order to win Priscilla back!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep261
programme.desc: Lighthouse Louie / Hiccup Plague - SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse, where he finds a cute but inconvenient companion. // No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep262
programme.desc: A Cabin in the Kelp / The Hankering - The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep263
programme.desc: Who R Zoo? / The Kwarantined Krab - SpongeBob and Patrick create their own zoo made entirely of bubbles! // The Krusty Krab goes under emergency quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep118
programme.desc: A Space Affair to Remember - While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Break Up - When two Croc Bandits have a spat, it's up to Po and Mr. Ping to set things right.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Kung Shoes - In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that will heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Avatar Returns - After Aang accidentally sets off a Fire Nation trap, he is banished from the South Pole. Soon after Prince Zuko attacks the Southern Water Tribe seeking to capture the Avatar. Aang returns and surrenders to save the Water Tribe.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Nuts to You - Fred the Squirrel has hit the jackpot. He stumbles onto a jackpot oak tree which is loaded with acorns (that's tons of money to animal folk).

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Mental Hen / Thumb Drive - A Delaware Blue Hen has taken up residence at the zoo, and she has the amazing ability to predict the future! // The penguins need a thumb, and Maurice's fits the bill nicely.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Antics on Ice / Showdown on Fairway 18 - The Lunacorns on Ice extravaganza is in town, and Skippers determined to take him as a treat. // A legendary putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Unhappy Campers / Leprechauns 2 - Never having made it to dark, the Middlemost Post decide their latest camping trip will finally be the one. // Bud and Buddy return to the mountain, claiming they're reformed leprechauns no longer seeking Parker's gold.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Bitter Work - When Aang struggles with a block while trying to learn Earthbending from Toph, he wonders if the problem is with him or his teacher. Meanwhile, Sokka gets himself in a jam.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Library - A professor leads the kids to a spirit library in the middle of the desert, where Sokka hopes to discover powerful secrets to use against the Fire Nation.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Cactus Sitting / Disaster of Hole 2 - The twins take a cactus called Pricklebutt to the beach and end up mounting a dramatic search and rescue mission. // Best and Bester won't let Grumpy Pants' round of golf stop them from catching the finale of their favourite show.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Get the Hump / Sing For Your Supper - It's Best to the rescue when Bester's phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Thug Loaf / Mine All Mine - When SwaySway and Buhdeuce deliver bread to the bad part of Duck Town, things go from quazy to quazier. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce meet the most righteous dude in the planet: the Bread Maker!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Anti-Poof - For every fairy, there's an anti-fairy - thus anti-Poof is born - FOOP! It's up to Poof to stop this anti-fairy from destroying Fairy World and his loved ones.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Vortex of Flames - Everyone celebrates Daphne's coronation on Domino, but Bloom is weak from sharing her Dragon Flame. With help from Diaspro, the Trix and Selina send Fire Eaters to attack Bloom. Will she find the power within herself to triumph?

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Hearts and Hugs Day / Teeny Terry's Treehouse - Otis isn't sure how to express his love for his friends on hearts and hugs day. // Teeny Terry wants his own home but doesn't know what he wants it to be like.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Mo and Bo, in the Snow / Otis Out Of Order - Mo and Bo are mistaken for a snow monster. // After taking a tumble, Otis suffers a fear of heights and becomes scared to use his elevator.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep89
programme.desc: The Krusty Sponge / Sing a Song of Patrick - SpongeBob becomes the latest local obsession after a notable food critic gives him high ratings. // SpongeBob helps Patrick get his song some air time at the local radio station.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep90
programme.desc: A Flea In Her Dome / Donut Of Shame / The Krusty Plate - SpongeBob and Patrick try to help Sandy rid her Tree Dome of fleas. // When Patrick accidentally takes SpongeBobs donut he is wracked with guilt over his crime. // SpongeBob battles a persistent speck of food that is on a plate.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep91
programme.desc: Goo Goo Gas / Le Big Switch - Plankton creates a gas that turns everyone at the Krusty Krab into babies. // After being enrolled in a chef exchange program, SpongeBob switches places with a snooty French chef from a high-end restaurant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep93
programme.desc: Picture Day / Pat No Pay / Blackjack - It's Picture Day for the Boating School Year Book. // When Patrick eats his weight in Krabby Patties without paying, Mr. Krabs puts him to work in the restaurant. // SpongeBob's parents are missing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep94
programme.desc: Blackened Sponge / Mermaid Man vs. Sponge - SpongeBob accidentally punches himself in the face leaving behind a hideous black eye, but is too embarrassed to tell anyone the truth. // Plankton has brainwashed Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep95
programme.desc: The Inmates of Summer / To Save a Squirrel - Instead of getting on the ship headed for summer camp, SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally board a ship full of prisoners on their way to jail on Inferno Island. // SpongeBob and Pat stow away on one of Sandys wilderness adventure.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Squashed - When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Writer's Block - When Dave suffers from writer's block, Alvin pretends to write a broadway show, which only makes Dave feel worse.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Jinxed! - After Theodore sees Alvin accidentally ruin Dave's computer, Alvin jinxes Theodore so he won't be able to tell on him.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - We meet a leading horticulturist whose day job is caring for the award-winning Cranbourne Botanic Gardens in Victoria.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - When Kurt ignores the advice of his team, his muster begins to look shaky. On the cusp of completing their biggest job, Liz leads them to the finish line. Clarry is determined to meet the cattle target for his new clients.

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In this summer special of China Tonight, Sam Yang and Annie Louey take a look at the historical events that have shaped one of the most fascinating and complex countries in the world.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Richard and Denise own 14 hotels so it is no surprise that when it came to designing their new house in a prime location high up in the Adelaide hills, their inspiration would come from the buildings that they love.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - We meet an archaeologist who is working to connect us more deeply with the places we call home.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Stephanie Borys.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs show, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Singer Elly-May Barnes on stepping out of her famous father Jimmy's musical shadow, on the long road to the spotlight and how she channels her physical challenges into a powerful cabaret act.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Compass Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Brendan Watkins is the son of a priest and nun. It took him 30 years to find out, but he's not the only one. Brendan meets other hidden children and their mothers, who've suffered from the Church's silence and denial.

programme.title: The World Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Thousands of statues stolen from temples across Cambodia and sold to collectors and museums are being tracked down as part of a global treasure hunt. The inside story of how several stolen antiquities ended up in Australia.

programme.title: History Bites Back
programme.desc: A look into the historical context of the fortunes and misfortunes of Aboriginal Australians from social security, citizenship and equal wages to nuclear bombs and civil actions.

programme.title: Heywire Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Heywire winner Miranda, a proud palawa woman, reflects on her ancestors resistance and survival and how they kept their culture and language alive.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs show, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: Wildest Pacific Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - There are 25,000 islands in the vast Pacific Ocean. From palm-lined pristine white beaches to cold rocky outcrops, each one fosters its own ecology with unique rules and behaviours.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Richard and Denise own 14 hotels so it is no surprise that when it came to designing their new house in a prime location high up in the Adelaide hills, their inspiration would come from the buildings that they love.

programme.title: Cancer: A Story of Hope - A Catalyst Special Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 22 - It's a diagnosis we all dread but with advances in technology and medicine, more people are living better and longer with cancer. We follow patients experiencing this new kind of care - their stories are filled with hope.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Singer Elly-May Barnes on stepping out of her famous father Jimmy's musical shadow, on the long road to the spotlight and how she channels her physical challenges into a powerful cabaret act.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Sri Lanka's Blue Giant Guardian: A pile of floating whale poo launched Asha de Vos's career. As global shipping lanes around Sri Lanka get busier, she is on a mission to protect the blue whales that call these waters home.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs show, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: The World Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep19
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. Fighting the scourge of skin cancer in the bush, plus the retired cattleman changing lives in Cambodia - one cow at a time.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - We visit some of those impacted by one of the worst natural disasters in Australia's history, the chance of a lifetime: but how much would you pay to dig up a dinosaur? Plus the Aussie teen who took on a monster wave and won.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Special Ep183
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - What will happen to house prices in 2024? In this special summer episode of The Business, Alicia Barry talks to economists, real estate agents and auctioneers about where house prices are going in the year ahead.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Emma Rebellato bring you news and interviews, Rani Hayman with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to Ruby Cornish in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Truth About Fasting - A Catalyst Special Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 22 - Intermittent fasting is growing in popularity, and aside from weight loss, there are claims it can improve our health. Dietician Dr Joanna McMillan tracks 5 people fasting to understand the benefits and impacts on our bodies.

programme.title: Art Works Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Guest host Rowdie Walden is at Moulin Rouge! The Musical; we look bravely at a new crop of Australian horror films at MIFF; things get absurd with The Chairs; plus a fresh perspective from Adelaide's Restless Dance Theatre.

programme.title: Step Into Paradise
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of iconic fashion designers Jenny Kee and Linda Jackson, whose pioneering style created a bold and unashamedly Australian fashion identity.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ardent collectors Kerry and Judy build a Santa Fe style mud house with thick natural clay rendered walls and exposed timbers, on a sloping bush block on Sydney's north shore.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep26

programme.title: What Broke The Rental Market?
programme.desc: As the cost of living goes up, nothing looms larger in our budgets than the roof over our heads. Casey Briggs looks at what an average wage gets you in some of the world's big cities, and lessons for our rental crisis.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now hell look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
